title: B.B. King - Midnight Believer (1978) [FLAC]
description:
B.B. King's 25th studio album is a succesful cooperation with The Crusaders - six songs are written by Will Jennings and Joe Sample, one by Jennings and Stix Hooper.



Tracklist:

    "When It All Comes Down (I'll Still Be Around)" - 4:11
    "Midnight Believer" - 4:59
    "I Just Can't Leave Your Love Alone" - 4:18
    "Hold On (I Feel Our Love Is Changing)" - 4:10
    "Never Make a Move Too Soon" (Stix Hooper, Jennings) - 5:29
    "A World Full of Strangers" - 4:23
    "Let Me Make You Cry a Little Longer" - 5:49


Lineup:

B.B. King - Guitar, Vocals

Roland Bautista - Guitar
George Bohannon - Horn
Dick Cary - Horn
Quitman Dennis - Horn, Saxophone
Wilton Felder - Bass, Saxophone
Chuck Findley - Horn
James Gadson - Drums 
Gary Herbig - Flute, Horn 
Stix Hooper - drums
Steve Madaio - Trumpet
Kurt McGettrick - Horn, Saxophone
Eddie Miller - Horn, Wind
Abe Most - Clarinet, Horn
Dean Parks - Guitar
Robert "Pops" Popwell - Bass
Joe Sample - Keyboards, Producer, Arrangements 
Ernie Watts - Saxophone
Julia Tillman Waters, Luther Waters, Oren Waters, Maxine Willard Waters - Vocals
